entry.title: Packaging Voodoo Revealed
entry.summary:
Description

Making software easy for other people to use is hard. We’ll talk about how to start a Python project to make it easy to share, how to create wheels and conda packages, and the critical technical details to consider to make sure that your packages work for as …
entry.content:
Description

Making software easy for other people to use is hard. We’ll talk about how to start a Python project to make it easy to share, how to create wheels and conda packages, and the critical technical details to consider to make sure that your packages work for as many people as possible.
